articles.title: Proud Boys leader has no sympathy for lawmakers targeted by Capitol riot
articles.description: The leader of the far-right Proud Boys group does not care that lawmakers were terrorized by rioters inside the US Capitol on January 6 as they tried to do their jobs. Enrique Tarrio spoke to CNN about what he thinks is next.

articles.description: CNN's Sara Sidner talks to Proud Boys leader Enrique Tarrio about the group's actions at the Capitol on January 6th and his ties to Trump ally Roger Stone and the FBI.

articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci tells CNN's Chris Cuomo about the importance of receiving the coronavirus vaccine, and how it can be helpful amid news of more variants spreading across the US.

articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Dutch parliament becomes second in a week to accuse China of genocide in Xinjiang
articles.description: The Dutch parliament on Thursday passed a non-binding motion saying the treatment of the Uyghur Muslim minority in China amounts to genocide, the first such move by a European country.

articles.author: Opinion by Shan Wu
articles.title: Anti-Asian violence must be charged as a hate crime
articles.description: Shan Wu writes that prosecutors need to charge anti-Asian violence as hate crimes to effectively deter future bigots from acting on their worst impulses and inflicting pain not just on the victim but on the entire Asian American community.
